tasks.title: âœ… Mission Control Setup Complete
tasks.description:
Mission Control has been deployed and configured.

**How it works:**
1. Create tasks here or drag existing to columns
2. Move to **In Progress** â†’ Assigned agent automatically starts working
3. Agent updates progress, marks subtasks done
4. Task moves to **Review** when complete
5. Approve or send back for rework
